Laura Munro

Designer / Developer

From creating beautiful illustrations to intuitive digital experiences, I am driven by my creative mind, high personal standards, and attention to detail.

A creative jack of all trades, I enjoy graphic and web design, illustration and web development. I love writing clean and concise CSS that looks gorgeous and functions seamlessly on every browser and device. I'm available for freelance or contract work, please contact me through either LinkedIn or Behance.

The Black Dog Resources

Links and resources for mental health

This is in no way an exclusive list, just a starting point.

Australia

If you or someone you know is in danger please call 000

  • Learn more and get help

    • www.beyondblue.org.au
    • www.youthbeyondblue.com
    • headtohealth.gov.au
    • www.orygen.org.au
    • www.mindmatters.edu.au

  • Phonelines

    • www.lifeline.org.au
    • Lifeline tel: 12 11 14
    • kidshelpline.com.au
    • Kids helpline tel: 1800 55 1800

  • Digital tools

    • www.betterhelp.com
    • www.talkspace.com

  • For parents/friends

    • Nine signs of mental health issues

  • Workplace resources

    • ozhelp.org.au

New Zealand

If you or someone you know is in danger please call 111

  • Learn more and get help

    • depression.org.nz
    • mentalhealth.org.nz
    • thelowdown.co.nz
    • www.commonground.org.nz

  • Phonelines

    • The Low Down tel: 0800 111 757
    • The Low Down txt: 5626
    • Lifeline tel: 0800 543 354
    • Lifeline txt: 4357
    • Suicide Crisis Helpline tel: 0508 828 865
    • Healthline tel: 0800 611 116

  • Digital tools

    • www.betterhelp.com
    • www.talkspace.com
    • www.sparx.org.nz

  • For friends/coworkers

    • Open Minds: For employers
    • Feeling supported at work is important too
    • You can play a key role in your loved one’s recovery
    • As a friend, sticking around shows you care

Alternative therapies

  • Nobody is ever missing : a novel by Catherine Lacey
  • It’s kind of a funny story : a novel by Ned Vizzini
  • Turtles all the way down : a novel by John Green
  • Eternal sunshine of the spotless mind : a movie from 2004
  • Hyperbole and a half : a web comic series and a book by Allie Brosh
  • Skins : a tv show from 2007 - 2013
  • You’re the worst : a tv show from 2014 onwards
  • BoJack Horseman : a tv show from 2014 onwards
  • Can you tolerate this? personal essays by Ashleigh Young
  • Hannah Gadsby : Nanette : a stand-up show from 2018 (on Netflix)
  • Looking for alaska : a novel by John Green
  • Please like me : a tv show from 2013 - 2016
